entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sandy Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -24.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
